pages.text: $(li)The Sack can save items, like a Shulker Box or a Backpack.$(br)$(li)It has nine slots of capacity.

$(li)You can carry a maximum two, because if you carry three  or more you will receive the Slowness effect.$(br)$(li)As you increase the number of Sacks, you will receive a stronger Slowness effect, making it harder and harder fo you to move.
